mapper.insert: insert into WS_TASK_ITEMS (taskitemid, taskid, params, datacount, handlecount, remark, remark1, remark2, remark3, results) values (#{taskitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datacount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{handlecount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{results,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update WS_TASK_ITEMS set taskid = #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datacount = #{datacount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, handlecount = #{handlecount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, results = #{results,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where taskitemid = #{taskitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select taskitemid, taskid, params, datacount, handlecount, remark, remark1, remark2, remark3, results from WS_TASK_ITEMS where taskitemid = #{taskitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select taskitemid, taskid, params, datacount, handlecount, remark, remark1, remark2, remark3, results from WS_TASK_ITEMS
